alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 03 at 10:10AM MDT until August 03 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of Utah, including the following areas, Cache Valley/Utah Portion, Eastern Box Elder County, Wasatch Mountains I-80 North and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive rainfall may result in flooding of small streams, creeks and flood prone areas as well as localized urban flooding. Debris flows and mudslides from recent burn scars are also possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Scattered to widespread rain and isolated thunderstorms are forecast to continue across portions of northern Utah into the early afternoon hours today. Areas of heavy rainfall with rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are forecast. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Western Uinta Mountains
